name: unreal-angelscript-tool-calling-fork
description: Language Server and Debug Adapter for the UnrealEngine-Angelscript plugin. Based on https://github.com/jiangxiaoxu/vscode-unreal-angelscript-tool-calling (forked from https://github.com/Hazelight/UnrealEngine-Angelscript).

languageModelTools.name: angelscript_searchApi
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search Angelscript API symbols/docs. Query: space=ordered tokens("a b"->a...b); "|"=OR; "."/"::" require exact separators("UObject."/"Math::"); with space they stay fuzzy("UObject ."/"Math ::"). Filters: kinds=[class|struct|enum|method|function|property|globalVariable], case-insensitive, multi; source=native|script|both(default both). includeDocs toggles docs. Paging: searchIndex required, maxBatchResults default 200. Regex: labelQueryUseRegex applies /pattern/flags (omit i=case-sensitive; non-literal default ignore case); signatureRegex filters parsed signatures with same regex syntax. Returns JSON envelope: success { ok:true, data:{ labelQuery, searchIndex, nextSearchIndex, remainingCount, total, returned, truncated, items{signature,docs?,type?}, text?, request? } }, failure { ok:false, error:{ code, message, details? } }.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Search Angelscript API symbols and docs.

labelQuery.description: Search query text for Angelscript API symbols.

maxBatchResults.description: Optional. Maximum number of results to return in this batch. Default is 200.

includeDocs.description: Optional. Include documentation text in the docs field. Default is false.

labelQueryUseRegex.description: Optional. Treat labelQuery as a regular expression applied to labels after kind filtering. Supports /pattern/flags (omit i for case-sensitive). If not using /pattern/flags, default ignore case. Default is false.

signatureRegex.description: Optional. Regular expression to filter parsed signatures. Supports /pattern/flags (omit i for case-sensitive). If not using /pattern/flags, default ignore case.

source.description: Optional. Filter results by source. Supported values: native, script, both. Default is both.

kinds.description: Optional. Filter results by kinds. Supported values: class, struct, enum, method, function, property, globalVariable. Case-insensitive; multiple values allowed.

languageModelTools.name: angelscript_getTypeMembers
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List members for a given Angelscript type, optionally including inherited members. Returns methods, properties, accessors, and mixins with visibility-qualified signatures. description is included only when includeDocs=true. Returns JSON envelope: success { ok:true, data:{ type:{ name, namespace, qualifiedName }, members:[{ kind, name, signature, description, declaredIn, declaredInKind, isInherited, isMixin, isAccessor, accessorKind?, propertyName?, visibility }] } }, failure { ok:false, error:{ code, message, details? } }.
languageModelTools.userDescription: List members for a given Angelscript type, optionally including inherited members.

namespace.description: Optional namespace to disambiguate type name. Use empty string for root namespace.

includeInherited.description: Optional. Include inherited members. Default is false.

includeDocs.description: Optional. Include description text. Default is false.

kinds.description: Optional. Filter by member kind. Default is both.

languageModelTools.name: angelscript_resolveSymbolAtPosition
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Resolve the symbol at a given document position. All line/character indices in tool input/output are 1-based. Input filePath supports absolute path or workspace-relative path (prefer "<workspaceFolderName>/..."). Returns JSON envelope: success { ok:true, data:{ symbol:{ kind, name, signature, definition?, doc? } } }, failure { ok:false, error:{ code, message, retryable?, hint?, details? } }. definition is { filePath, startLine, endLine, preview } with workspace-relative-first path output; preview is source snippet text (max 20 lines) and checks one line above start for Unreal macros UCLASS/UPROPERTY/UFUNCTION/UENUM.

filePath.description: Path to the file containing the symbol. Supports absolute path or workspace-relative path (prefer "<workspaceFolderName>/...").

includeDocumentation.description: Include documentation when available. Default is true.

languageModelTools.name: angelscript_getClassHierarchy
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get class hierarchy in compact JSON for an exact class name (e.g., "APawn"). Returns JSON envelope: success { ok:true, data:{ root, supers, derivedByParent, sourceByClass, limits:{ maxSuperDepth, maxSubDepth, maxSubBreadth }, truncated:{ supers, derivedDepth, derivedBreadthByClass } } }, failure { ok:false, error:{ code, message, details? } }. supers order is nearest parent first up to root. derivedByParent is parent -> direct children[] with stable class-name ordering. sourceByClass[className] is { source:"cpp" } or { source:"as", filePath, startLine, endLine, preview }, where filePath prefers workspace-relative path with root prefix and falls back to absolute path when outside workspace; lines are 1-based; preview is source snippet text (max 20 lines).
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get compact class hierarchy with script class file path and line range.

maxSuperDepth.description: Optional. Maximum number of supertypes to return. Non-negative integer. Default is 3.

maxSubDepth.description: Optional. Maximum depth for subtype tree. Non-negative integer. Default is 2.

maxSubBreadth.description: Optional. Maximum number of direct children returned per class. Non-negative integer. Default is 10. Truncation per class is reported in truncated.derivedBreadthByClass.

languageModelTools.name: angelscript_findReferences
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Find references for the symbol at a given document position. All line/character indices in tool input/output are 1-based. Input filePath supports absolute path or workspace-relative path (prefer "<workspaceFolderName>/..."). Returns JSON envelope: success { ok:true, data:{ total, references:[{ filePath, startLine, endLine, range, preview }] } }, failure { ok:false, error:{ code, message, retryable?, hint?, details? } }. Path output prefers workspace-relative with root prefix and falls back to absolute path when outside workspace. preview is source snippet text (max 20 lines). range is 1-based.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find references for the symbol at a given document position.

filePath.description: Path to the file containing the symbol. Supports absolute path or workspace-relative path (prefer "<workspaceFolderName>/...").

UnrealAngelscript.insertParenthesisOnFun.description: Insert parenthesis pair when auto-completing a function call.

UnrealAngelscript.diagnosticsForUnrealNa.description: Emit diagnostic warnings and hints when types, functions, or variables violate the Unreal naming convention.

UnrealAngelscript.markUnreadVariablesAsU.description: Variables that are written to but never read are marked as unused as well.

UnrealAngelscript.mathCompletionShortcut.description: Add completions for functions in the Math:: namespace so they can be completed without typing Math:: first.

UnrealAngelscript.correctFloatLiteralsWh.markdownDescription: When a float literal is typed (eg `1.f`) in a context where double-precision is expected, automatically correct it (eg to `1.0`)

UnrealAngelscript.unrealConnectionPort.description: What port to use when connecting to the Unreal engine game or editor instance for auto-completion and debugging. Must match the debug port configured in the Unreal Engine project settings, or as a launch argument (-asdebugport=).

UnrealAngelscript.inlayHints.inlayHintsE.description: Enable inlay hints rendered by the angelscript extension.

UnrealAngelscript.inlayHints.parameterHi.description: Show parameter name hints when passing a constant literal argument.
Show parameter name hints when passing a complex expression as an argument.

UnrealAngelscript.inlayHints.parameterRe.description: Show an inlay hint when a parameter takes a writeable reference.

UnrealAngelscript.inlayHints.parameterHi.description: Enable parameter name hints for functions that are only passed a single argument.

UnrealAngelscript.inlayHints.typeHintsFo.description: Show the name of the type as an inlay hint on auto declarations.
Types in this list will never receive a type hint for an auto declaration

UnrealAngelscript.inlayHints.parameterHi.description: Parameters with a name included in this list will be ignored for inlay hints.
Functions with a name included in this list will be ignored for inlay hints

UnrealAngelscript.inlineValues.showInlin.description: When debugging, show an inline value next to local variable declarations.
When debugging, show an inline value for function parameters.
When debugging, show an inline value next to direct assignments of this member variables.
When debugging, show an inline value above the function declaration to display the this pointer and Owner of the object.

UnrealAngelscript.scriptIgnorePatterns.description: Glob patterns to ignore when searching for script files to parse.

UnrealAngelscript.codeLenses.showCreateB.description: Script classes inheriting from the specified classes will have a 'Create Blueprint' prompt above them if they don't already have a blueprint implementation.

UnrealAngelscript.dataBreakpoints.cppBre.description: Should Data Breakpoints trigger in C++? If not, any Data Breakpoint will surface as an AS breakpoint, potentially missing the C++ callstack.
How many times a C++ Data Breakpoint should trigger (silently) before activating and disabling, -1 means it will never disable automatically.

UnrealAngelscript.dataBreakpoints.asBrea.description: How many times a AS Data Breakpoint should trigger (silently) before activating and disabling, -1 means it will never disable automatically.

UnrealAngelscript.projectCodeGeneration..description: Should project code generation be enabled? If not, only built-in code generation will be applied.
What generators to apply during analysis.

items.description: A code generator to apply to a given class/struct.

derivedFrom.description: The class this generator will apply to.

staticFunctions.description: List of static functions to generate for the target class.

returnType.description: The type name of the class/struct to be returned. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

name.description: Name of this function. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

args.description: List of argument types for this function.

type.description: The type name of the class/struct to be used. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

name.description: The name of the argument. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

memberFunctions.description: List of member functions to generate for the target class.

returnType.description: The type name of the class/struct to be returned. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

name.description: Name of this function. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

args.description: List of argument types for this function.

type.description: The type name of the class/struct to be used. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

name.description: The name of the argument. Supports patterns such as `{class}`.

const.description: Whether or not this function is const qualified.

property.description: Whether or not this function marked as a property accessor.

staticAccessors.description: List of static accessors to generate for the target class.

derivedFrom.description: The property type this generator will apply to.

returnType.description: The type name of the class/struct to be returned. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

name.description: Name of this function. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

args.description: List of argument types for this function.

type.description: The type name of the class/struct to be used. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

name.description: The name of the argument. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

memberAccessors.description: List of member accessors to generate for the target class.

derivedFrom.description: The property type this generator will apply to.

returnType.description: The type name of the class/struct to be returned. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

name.description: Name of this function. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

args.description: List of argument types for this function.

type.description: The type name of the class/struct to be used. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

name.description: The name of the argument. Supports patterns such as `{class}, {propType}, {propName}`.

const.description: Whether or not this function is const qualified.

property.description: Whether or not this function marked as a property accessor.

UnrealAngelscript.completion.dependencyR.description: Restrictions to apply for which modules can depend on symbols from which other modules

isolate.description: Isolate symbols in modules matching this, so they cannot be used outside that match

unisolate.description: Modules matching this don't obey isolation restrictions

UnrealAngelscript.mcp.enabled.description: Enable the built-in MCP server for tool calling.

UnrealAngelscript.mcp.maxStartupFailures.description: Maximum failed startups before MCP retries stop.

trace.description: Enable logging of the Debug Adapter Protocol.

port.description: Port to AS debug server. If 0, we use the Unreal Connection Port from the extension settings.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.postinstall: cd extension && npm install && cd ../language-server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.pegjs:test: cd language-server/pegjs && peggy angelscript.pegjs --allowed-start-rules start,start_global,start_class,start_enum --trace --test-file test.as -S start
